titleInfo.title: Portrait of Mary Ann Lundy Lytle.

mods.note: A native of Cincinnati, Ohio, Mary Ann Lundy Lytle married Andrew D. Lytle, Sr. in 1855.

physicalDescription.note: Photograph : resin coated paper print from copy negative

titleInfo.title: Andrew D. Lytle's Baton Rouge' Photograph Collection/

mods.note: Andrew D. Lytle Album Photograph Collection, Mss. 3708, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, Baton Rouge, Louisiana.
